briefdescription.para: Reference to the action that is to be rebound.
ID (in string form) of the binding that is to be rebound on the action.
Text component that receives the name of the action.
Text component that receives the display string of the binding.

detaileddescription.para: Can be null in which case the component entirely relies on updateBindingUIEvent.

briefdescription.para: Optional text component that receives a text prompt when waiting for a control to be actuated.
Optional UI that is activated when an interactive rebind is started and deactivated when the rebind is finished.

detaileddescription.para: This is normally used to display an overlay over the current UI while the system is waiting for a control to be actuated.
If neither rebindPrompt nor rebindOverlay is set, the component will temporarily replaced the bindingText (if not null) with "Waiting...".

briefdescription.para: Event that is triggered every time the UI updates to reflect the current binding.

detaileddescription.para: This can be used to tie custom visualizations to bindings.

briefdescription.para: Event that is triggered when an interactive rebind is started on the action.
Event that is triggered when an interactive rebind has been completed or canceled.
When an interactive rebind is in progress, this is the rebind operation controller.
Return the action and binding index for the binding that is targeted by the component according to
Trigger a refresh of the currently displayed binding.
Initiate an interactive rebind that lets the player actuate a control to choose a new binding for the action.
A reusable component with a self-contained UI for rebinding a single action.
